decks.notes: The central concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively dominate the board by playing efficient creatures with strong combat abilities, backed up by burn spells for removal and reach. The deck aims to maintain a low curve and high creature count, with cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Bonecrusher Giant, and Soul-Scar Mage providing early pressure. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds consistency and versatility to the deck. Overall, the key idea is to apply constant pressure and deal damage efficiently to overcome opponents before they can stabilize.

This aggressive Red Deck Wins deck relies on quickly overwhelming opponents with cheap and efficient creatures that deal damage, supported by direct damage spells. The deck features creatures like Monastery Swiftspear, Kari Zev, and Eidolon of the Great Revel, all of which can attack early and deal damage quickly. The spells Lightning Strike and Play with Fire can be used to destroy opposing creatures or directly damage opponents. Torbran, Thane of Red Fell and Kumano Faces Kakkazan amplify the damage output of creatures and spells, while Ramunap Ruins and Den of the Bugbear provide additional sources of damage.
